title: LF Team low ELO To Climb
body:
Looking For People to join Low ELO team. Finished Last season in Silver 4 but have had no luck with teams in ranked this season so looking to get a group together to get back up there with no toxicity, rage quitting or harrasment.
Im a mid/adc main.
Add me : Bronzeadonis
Chur GL

replies.body:
Hi

I am a s5 support main. Took a bit of a hiatus but back for a few matches a day. Final semester at the moment but after that will have more time for more matches
Swt I have a couple but looking for around 7 so we normally have 5 at least on at same time so feel free to add me
If you find a bunch of people I'll happily join top/jg main
